posts.content:
6V Ebespacher heater for sale, I bought this to fit to my van but as I'm running twin carbs it wont fit in the engine bay and I can't fit it anywhere else with my interior because it's huge, 3'2" end to end and 16" high.
I will have to sell this as spares or repairs, I have never fitted it nor had it up and running, the main switch opens the ducting as it should, but other than that I wouldn't like to make any promises about which bits, if any, are working..... sorry.
I can bring it to Vicky Farm or Stanford Hall, or it can be collected from Redditch (12 miles South of Birmingham)
I have seen these for sale as spares or repair for £125, but I'll be happy to get back what I paid for it.. £45

could you box this up and ill sort a courier?

let me know matey, wont be back online till late tomorrow night, but im very interested!

cheers
alex.

67USA wrote:
could you box this up and ill sort a courier?

let me know matey, wont be back online till late tomorrow night, but im very interested!

cheers

That will be no problem, will you need to know the weight?
